description:
Looking for a half/twin-rope that won't break the bank? Or maybe you just need a short-ish section of rope for glacier travel? The Starling fits the bill. It's light to carry and pack and won't crush your budget and, as a Bluesign®-certified rope, it ensures it's environmental impact is minimized.

  • Pro Dry finish provides durable water and dirt protection to UIAA standard
  • Thermo-shield treatment result in a great feel and handling characteristics
  • Sold by the meter
  • Specs shown are for use as a half rope
  • When used as a twin rope, the specs are as follows (based on tests with 2 strands): Dynamic elongation: 29% Static elongation: 9% Impact force: 10.2kN UIAA fall rating: 30
name: Edelrid Starling Pro 8.2mm Dry Rope
